welcome_message_body: Welcome to Musashino, Japan! Get ready to experience the charm of this vibrant city known for its beautiful parks, rich culture, and delicious cuisine. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Musashino has to offer during your stay.

restaurants.name: Sakurai (麺屋 さくら井)
restaurants.description: Sakurai (麺屋 さくら井) is a ramen restaurant located in 武蔵野市.

restaurants.name: Sizzler
restaurants.description: Sizzler is a steakhouse located in 武蔵野市.
restaurants.address: 中町2-4-1 (リッチモンドホテル東京武蔵野), 武蔵野市, 東京都, 180-0006

restaurants.name: Dans Dix ans
restaurants.description: Dans Dix ans is a bakery located in 武蔵野市.
restaurants.address: 吉祥寺本町2-28-2, 武蔵野市, 東京都, 180-0004

restaurants.name: 中淸 手打清田
restaurants.description: 中淸 手打清田 is a soba restaurant located in 武蔵野市.
restaurants.address: 吉祥寺本町4-4-15, 武蔵野市, 東京都, 180-0004

restaurants.name: Campus Musashino (武蔵野カンプス)
restaurants.description: Campus Musashino (武蔵野カンプス) is a italian restaurant located in 武蔵野市.
restaurants.address: 中町2-1-9 (I.Gビル 1F), 武蔵野市, 東京都, 180-0006

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Haneda Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The secondary terminal at Haneda Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free Wi-Fi for up to 3 hours per day.
